Welcome to lanuto.github.io

About Me

Selamat Datang, my name is Lanuto and this website was written by me.
Some personal facts:

  • I'm 24 years old
  • I love surfing
  • Marmite tastes ok to me... not great or terrible, just decent

Want a Website?

I offer web design services to people who want them. Pricing will vary depending on what you want. If you want a simple webpage that displays contact information, I can give you that for 20 dollars. If you want me to recreate Facebook, it will cost more. I do not host websites however, I only design them. If you want it kept on the internet, you will need a hosting service (e.g. Hostinger). They will probably ask for a monthly fee. I only accept payments via Paypal.

If you're interested, you can contact me using the contact form.
